definition: to resemble/to be like/to look as if/such as/appearance/image/portrait/image under a mapping (math.)

sentences.english: Setup a matrix for pixel-correct rendering.
sentences.chinese: 設置一個矩陣用於像素矯正渲染。

sentences.english: A novel pixel-level image fusion scheme based on gradient pyramid decomposition is presented.
sentences.chinese: 給出了基於梯度塔形分解的像素級圖像融合新方法。

sentences.english: Some of the pixel formats contain premultiplied color values.
sentences.chinese: 某些像素格式包含自左乘的顏色值。

sentences.english: Sets the pix el at the specified point to the closest approximation of the specified color.
sentences.chinese: 設置指定點像素爲最接近指定色的近似值。

sentences.english: Each icon corresponds to a 16x16 pixels image.
sentences.chinese: 每個圖標都是一副16x16像素的圖形。

sentences.english: Please select all the photos you request for the high-resolution version, and then click the bottom button.
sentences.chinese: 請在選中所有所需高像素圖片後，點擊下方按鈕。

sentences.english: My renderings are usually no larger than 750 pixels wide.
sentences.chinese: 我的渲染圖像通常都不超過750像素寬。

sentences.english: This is because motion estimation is performed to sub-pixel resolution.
sentences.chinese: 這是因爲運動估計執行到子像素分辨率。

sentences.english: In this thesis, our study is aimed at pixel-level image fusion.
sentences.chinese: 本論文的研究就是基於像素級圖像的融合。

sentences.english: Then a predetermining and surpassing the rigid displacements way is developed.
sentences.chinese: 尤其是小視場時剛體位移可達幾十個像素。

sentences.english: It has a 3.0-megapixel camera and camcorder, and comes with 4GB of internal memory.
sentences.chinese: 機型配備3百萬像素攝像頭，內置4GB內存。

sentences.english: A line or fillable with an outline that is drawn greater than one pixel wide is a thick shape.
sentences.chinese: 超過一個像素值的線條或者勾畫出的粗輪廓。

sentences.english: A tipical reset technique for five transistors active pixel is proposed.
sentences.chinese: 提出了一種適用於五管有源像素的復位技術。

sentences.english: The bufferDepth property sets or returns the bit depth of the color palette in the off-screen bitmap buffer.
sentences.chinese: 設置或獲取用於畫面外位圖緩衝顏色的每像素位數。

sentences.english: By adjusting the mirrors under each cavity, these pixels can be made to produce different colours.
sentences.chinese: 調節每個空腔下的鏡子，這些像素就能產生不同顏色。

sentences.english: “That doesn’t mean the rest of the pixels are useless,” Ma cautions.
sentences.chinese: “這並不意味着其餘的像素是無用的”，馬毅說。

definition: contrast (balance of black and white in TV screen setup)/degree of contrast
